channel.title: Ekstrak - Tick Tock (Dubstep)
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/shane-brown-97094682/tick-tock
I actually have a backstory for this song.
So, this project was made during that week off I took. It was to express the amount of total boredom it was when away from music. This oroject was first a Drum and Bass Project. I can show you the old version of this project https://app.auxy.co/projects/i-QM_mC2oAi8i9JK8n11-Q== Then, I realized how great 140 bpm went with the track, so I replaced the typical DnB drums and replaced them with Dubstep drums, and I also added dubstep wubs too. I hope you guys like it!

item.title: Ekstrak - Tick Tock (Dubstep)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Yeah the original wasn’t bad but your new treatment of it is wayyyy better good choice!

Read full topic

item.title: Ekstrak - Tick Tock (Dubstep)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I really like this quite a bit! I end up doing the same thing frequently, something starts off as DnB and I end up pulling the tempo back just to see. Sometimes it sounds better and isn’t drum and bass anymore, and then sometimes it goes back to being DnB again

I’m gonna listen to the original project in a min. You’ve gone beyond the wub on this, I’m not entirely sure how you wrangled some of these sounds but I dig em!

Read full topic

item.title: Ekstrak - Tick Tock (Dubstep)

item.description:
https://soundcloud.com/shane-brown-97094682/tick-tock

I actually have a backstory for this song.

So, this project was made during that week off I took. It was to express the amount of total boredom it was when away from music. This oroject was first a Drum and Bass Project. I can show you the old version of this project https://app.auxy.co/projects/i-QM_mC2oAi8i9JK8n11-Q==
